gracious.translation[0].definitions[0].d: behaving in a polite, kind, and generous way, especially to people of a lower rank
gracious.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Sibyl was the most gracious, helpful, and generous person to work with.
gracious.translation[0].definitions[1].d: having the kind of expensive style, comfort, and beauty that only rich people can afford
gracious.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a gracious act by or gift from God is kind and forgiving
gracious.translation[0].definitions[3].d: used as a polite way of describing a royal person
